agenda_items.name: Changes in Authorized Banking Personnel
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to adopt a resolution to update the authorized personnel able to perform banking and investment transactions for Long Beach Transit. (Lisa Patton)

attachments.filename: 11. Management Services for Workers' Compensation Claims and Medical Bill Review Services.pdf

agenda_items.name: Management Services for Workers’ Compensation Claims and Medical Bill Review Services
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize the President and CEO to enter into a three-year, fixed-rate contract with Athens Administrators for the provision of management services for workers’ compensation claims and medical bill review services, at a cost of $842,827 with two, one-year options at $301,051 for Option Year One, and $309,873 for Option Year Two, for a total authorization amount not to exceed $1,453,751. (LaVerne David)

agenda_items.name: Epoxy Shop Floor System Application
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize the President and CEO to enter into a contract with Servicon Systems, Inc., for the installation of Tennant Epoxy floor coating systems at the LBT2 Maintenance building, at a cost of $135,313 with two options at $168,644 for Option Year One and $175,840 for Option Year Two, for a total authorization amount not to exceed $479,797. (Debra Johnson)
